body.body: The Speed Triple S and Speed Triple R are fitted with an electronic engine management system which encompasses control of both ignition and fuel delivery. The engine Electronic Control Module (ECM) is electronically paired to the immobiliser/TPMS control module to help prevent theft of the motorcycle (see

). The engine ECM also draws information from sensors positioned around the engine, cooling and air intake systems and precisely calculates ignition advance and fueling requirements for all engine speeds and loads.
In addition, the system has an on-board diagnostic function. For additional information see

title: Engine Management System Description
